entry.title: Sunday: Mainly sunny. High 11.

entry.title: Sunday night: A few rain showers or flurries. Low plus 1.
entry.summary: Mainly cloudy. A few rain showers beginning this evening and ending overnight then 30 percent chance of flurries or rain showers. Wind southeast 20 km/h becoming west 30 gusting to 60 except gusting to 90 in a few localities late this evening and after midnight. Low plus 1. Forecast issued 5:00 AM MDT Sunday 9 April 2023
